markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Giant Dragonfly Nymph](/Monsters.aspx?ID=637)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The aquatic, wingless offspring of dragonflies are called dragonfly nymphs. Giant dragonfly nymphs can be several feet in length and mostly hunt in shallow waters, eating carrion and ambushing living creatures with their fully grown counterparts. They are not daunted by larger creatures, compelled by their instinct to eat as much as possible to sustain their growth.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Giant Dragonfly Nymph](/Monsters.aspx?ID=637)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
<trait label="Aquatic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=168" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 98 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +8; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23), [wavesense (imprecise) 30 feet](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=41)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +10, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +2

**Con** +4

**Int** -5

**Wis** +1

**Cha** -5
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 19 

**Fort** +11 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +6 

</row>

**HP** 46

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 10 feet, swim 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
mandibles +12 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 1d10+6 piercing

**Extend Mandibles** <actions string="Single Action" />  The giant dragonfly nymph extends its jaws to a surprising distance. The dragonfly nymph makes a mandibles Strike with a reach of 10 feet, but the mandibles lose the [agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170) trait for this Strike.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-133" />
name: Giant Dragonfly Nymph
